subject: Hello My dear, how are you
body:
Hello My dear, how are you today hope you are fine? I write to inform
you that we have already sent you  $5,200.00. United State
Dollars through Western union  as we have been given the mandate to
transfer your full compensation payment the total sum of $950.000.00 (
Nine Hundred and
Fifty Thousand United State Dollars) via western union by this
Government.I was been trying to send you an E-mail since yesterday for
the Western Union
payment Details but the message keep returning back I don't really
know why, therefore I try to re-send the e-mail to you again today
with all the Western
Union payment information for you to pick up the money from any outlet
Western Union around you, such as  MTCN and Sender Name so that you
will pick up this
$5,200.00. United State Dollars to enable us send another $5,200.00.
tomorrow as you know we will be sending you only  $5,200.00 United
State Dollars per day.
Please copy all this information and run to any nearest Western Union
to pick up the  $5,200.00.
E-mail: (( 
davidpaul677@aol.com
 ))  call or email me once you picked
up this  $5,200.00. United State Dollars today. Here is the Western
Union information to pick up the  $5,200.00. United State
Dollars.MTCN :___________# 479-414-97xx
Sender's Name:______ Peter Oba
Text Question:___________trust
Answer:___________________honest
Amount:______________________ $5,200.00. United State Dollars I am
waiting for your call once you pick up this  $5,200.00. Please E-mail
me
your direct telephone number because I need to be calling you once we
send any payment for the information. Note we really need your current
direct phone so that once we make any payment we shall call you for
the MTCN.Yours In Service, therefore remember that you will send 99usd
for the activation of your document file so that your payment will
reflect in your name immediately, 
you are advise to buy apple gift
card of 99usd and send it now,
 and start your withdrawing immediately.
Mr.David Paul Steven
ECO Bank Benin Republic.

subject: Re:    Hello My dear, how are you
body:
Dear Paul Steven,

I am doing well, thank you for asking. I appreciate your efforts in sending the funds through Western Union. However, I am a bit confused about the details of this transaction.

Could you please provide me with the exact MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number) and the sender's full name? This information is crucial for me to pick up the money from my local Western Union outlet.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "activation of your document file"? What documents are these exactly? And why do I need to purchase an Apple gift card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Matthew
